package com.bdqn.c2.mishuai;

import java.io.Serializable;

public class Students implements Serializable {
	public Students() {
		super();
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}
	private String name;
	public String getName() {
		return name;
	}
	public void setName(String name) {
		this.name = name;
	}
	public int getAge() {
		return age;
	}
	public void setAge(int age) {
		this.age = age;
	}
	private int age;
	public Students(String name, int age) {
		super();
		this.name = name;
		this.age = age;
	}
	
}





public class Fanshe {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		Students s1=new Students("帅", 19);
		try {
			ObjectOutputStream oos=new ObjectOutputStream(new FileOutputStream("E:\\222\\22.txt"));
			oos.writeObject(s1);
			ObjectInputStream ois=new ObjectInputStream(new FileInputStream("E:\\222\\22.txt"));
			Students s2=(Students) ois.readObject();
			System.out.println("名字是："+s2.getName()+"\n"+"年龄是："+s2.getAge());
			oos.close();
			ois.close();
		} catch (FileNotFoundException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		} catch (ClassNotFoundException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
	}
}
